standards.description: Cite textual evidence to support analysis of what the text says
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite textual evidence to support analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Determine a theme or central idea of a text
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine a theme or central idea of a text and how it is conveyed through particular details; provide a summary of the text distinct from personal opinions or judgments.

standards.description: Describe how a story's or drama's plot unfolds
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Describe how a particular story's or drama's plot unfolds in a series of episodes as well as how the characters respond or change as the plot moves toward a resolution.

standards.description: Cite textual evidence to support analysis of informational text
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite textual evidence to support analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Integrate information presented in different media or formats
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Integrate information presented in different media or formats (e.g., visually, quantitatively) as well as in words to develop a coherent understanding of a topic or issue.

standards.description: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence.

standards.description: Write informative/explanatory texts to examine a topic
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write informative/explanatory texts to examine a topic and convey ideas, concepts, and information through the selection, organization, and analysis of relevant content.

standards.description: Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar and usage when writing or speaking.

standards.description: Cite several pieces of textual evidence to support analysis
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite several pieces of textual evidence to support analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Determine a theme or central idea and analyze its development
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine a theme or central idea of a text and analyze its development over the course of the text; provide an objective summary of the text.

standards.description: Cite several pieces of textual evidence for informational text analysis
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite several pieces of textual evidence to support analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence, introducing claim(s), acknowledging alternate or opposing claims, and organizing the reasons and evidence logically.

standards.description: Determine or clarify the meaning of unknown and multiple-meaning words
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine or clarify the meaning of unknown and multiple-meaning words and phrases based on grade 7 reading and content, choosing flexibly from a range of strategies.

standards.description: Cite the textual evidence that most strongly supports an analysis
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite the textual evidence that most strongly supports an analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Determine a theme or central idea and analyze its development including its relationship to characters, setting, and plot
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine a theme or central idea of a text and analyze its development over the course of the text, including its relationship to the characters, setting, and plot; provide an objective summary of the text.

standards.description: Determine the meaning of words and phrases as used in a text
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine the meaning of words and phrases as they are used in a text, including figurative and connotative meanings; analyze the impact of specific word choices on meaning and tone, including analogies or allusions to other texts.

standards.description: Cite the textual evidence that most strongly supports an analysis of informational text
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Cite the textual evidence that most strongly supports an analysis of what the text says explicitly as well as inferences drawn from the text.

standards.description: Analyze in detail the structure of a specific paragraph in a text
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Analyze in detail the structure of a specific paragraph in a text, including the role of particular sentences in developing and refining a key concept.

standards.description: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence. Introduce claim(s), acknowledge and distinguish the claim(s) from alternate or opposing claims, and organize the reasons and evidence logically.

standards.description: Write informative/explanatory texts to examine a topic and convey ideas
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write informative/explanatory texts to examine a topic and convey ideas, concepts, and information through the selection, organization, and analysis of relevant content.

standards.description: Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar when writing or speaking
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar and usage when writing or speaking.

standards.description: Determine or clarify the meaning of unknown and multiple-meaning words and phrases
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Determine or clarify the meaning of unknown and multiple-meaning words and phrases based on grade 8 reading and content, choosing flexibly from a range of strategies.

standards.description: Engage effectively in collaborative discussions
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Engage effectively in a range of collaborative discussions (one-on-one, in groups, and teacher-led) with diverse partners on grade 7 topics, texts, and issues, building on others' ideas and expressing their own clearly.

standards.description: Present claims and findings emphasizing salient points
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Present claims and findings, emphasizing salient points in a focused, coherent manner with relevant evidence, sound valid reasoning, and well-chosen details; use appropriate eye contact, adequate volume, and clear pronunciation.

standards.description: Write narratives to develop real or imagined experiences
standards.subject: English Language Arts
standards.full_text: Write narratives to develop real or imagined experiences or events using effective technique, relevant descriptive details, and well-structured event sequences.
